body.p: having unfortunatly gotten in to a Little difficulty I would most Respectfully request you to remit the fine which amount is Seven dollars. & fifty cts, I am a poor man with a family and having no steady work. I have not the money to pay it the fine by remitting the above you would confer a favor on me not soon to Be forgotten

Most Respectfully,
Yours. Thos. J. Hutchison

Nov. 12/ 61
R. Gillispie
Louis Bager
Nelson Alley

Frankfort Po. Ct
$750 } mis
Tho. J. Hutchinson
